item.description:
Could cold calling actually become fun? Come hear Dave Sopelak's experiences about 
one of his favorite topics: 
 
"Cold Calling, a necessary evil when you need to promote your company.  
Though it's not the only avenue for self promotion, it seems to be the  
part that most people fear. We will discuss my approach and views on  
this subject and through our conversation it is my hopes that you will  
walk away with at least one thought process that will work for you. 
I look forward to meeting you all." 
 
Sincerely 
David Sopelak 
 
We will be meeting at Eastworks in the offices of MRW connected in Suite #328 from 6:30 - 8:30pm

 

Park in the large parking lot. go to the entrance that has the movie
marquee over it. Immediately on your left, there is an elevator. Go to
the third floor. Step 15 feet beyond the elevator, look for the door
on the right that says MRW Connected on it (opposite the Eastworks
management office).
item.why: Come to a round table discussion with Dave Sopelak who actually loves cold calling! We'll have an informal discussion, where all questions around building new client relationships can be brought to the table. Come with your ideas and challenges.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: The Fine Art of Cold Calling - Business Skills Discussion Series
